          function animateCounter(element, target) {
            let current = 0;
            const increment = target / 100;
            const timer = setInterval(() => {
              current += increment;
              element.textContent = Math.floor(current);
              if (current >= target) {
                element.textContent = target;
                clearInterval(timer);
              }
            }, 20);
          }
